data.title: Licensing Authorities Release Emergency Medicinal and Adult-Use Cannabis Regulations
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – California’s three state cannabis licensing authorities announced today that proposed emergency licensing regulations for commercial medicinal and adult-use cannabis have been posted online and are available to the public for review.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
